answers.text:
A firm called Azavar, based in Chicago, does audits to determine if cities are receiving accurate utility taxes.  I've utilized them in two towns.  Jason Perry at Azavar can be reached at 1-312-583-0100 or 1-800-683-0800.  The web address is www.azavaraudit.com
